title: Pixel 2 "files" app using 75% of battery in a day
content: I've never had any battery issues, suddenly my phone is draining rapidly (went from full to dead in about 4 hrs today with typical use, usually it lasts all day and gets charged at night when I sleep). When I search what apps are using the battery, I see that "files" is using 75% of my battery. I can't even find "files" on my phone. I haven't updated in quite awhile so it's not a new software update. Reboot has no effect. Any ideas?
